chess.gui.panels
Class ChessDocumentView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  chess.gui.panels.ChessDocumentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ChessDocumentView
extends javax.swing.JPanel

ChessDocumentView uses DocumentThumbnail's to display thumbnail visualizations of the chess games in ChessDocuments

See Also:
Serialized Form
